name: Squall
short_description: Squall is a set of servers for the Peer Distributed Transfer Protocol (PDTP), a BitTorrent-like protocol with stricter server control and support for exporting large, dynamically changing hierarchical filesystems (i.e. more akin to HTTP/FTP).

license.fullpath: License :: OSI-Approved Open Source :: Apache Software License
